definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Everywhere we went, the French were grand to us.
sentences.chinese: 我們到處受到法國人的熱情接待。

sentences.english: Humour in the ads is a recent innovation, but parodies of them are plentiful.
sentences.chinese: 廣告中幽默這一創新出現不久，卻被到處效顰。

sentences.english: The passenger side of my car has dents and scratches all over it.
sentences.chinese: 車子的右側到處是凹痕和刮痕。

sentences.english: The business world is full of examples of hubris taking over.
sentences.chinese: 企業界到處都是自大狂掌管一切的例子。

sentences.english: The straw ropes lay all over the ship's deck.
sentences.chinese: 船甲板上到處都是草繩。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival day everywhere decorated, beaming.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節這天到處張燈結綵，喜氣洋洋。

sentences.english: With a car people can go any place without spending a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 擁有一輛汽車，人們不用花很多錢便可以到處走動。

sentences.english: My head throbbed. There was blood all over the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我的腦袋悸跳着作痛，雪地上到處都是血。

sentences.english: 9-2. In those days wandering minstrels were welcome everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 當時，浪跡四方的吟遊歌手到處受歡迎。

sentences.english: Dai Xixin looked everywhere for him.
It was for this reason that Parvati, his wife, sought him everywhere without results.
sentences.chinese: 爲止，他的妻子帕娃蒂，到處尋找他而毫無結果。

sentences.english: All over the world, there are classes that teach people how to flirt.
sentences.chinese: 在世界上，到處都有教人們如何調情的課程。

sentences.english: The sky glowed Saturday and a thin dusting of sand covered Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京週六天空灰濛濛的，到處是薄薄的揚沙塵土。

sentences.english: Our 2-year old likes to run around in his birthday suit.
sentences.chinese: 我們兩歲的孩子喜歡光着身子到處跑。

sentences.english: The street is jammed with taxis and pedicabs.
sentences.chinese: 整條街上到處是出租車和三輪車。

sentences.english: In the springtime, yellow rape sead flower blossomed everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在春天，到處開的都是黃色的油菜花。

definition: all over the place/everywhere and all directions
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
